title: This New AI Can Take Notes Faster Than a Pro
description: VoiceType AI transcribes 360 words per minute at 99% accuracy, and it's only $49 for a lifetime subscription
content:
TL;DR: Transcribe every meeting with VoiceType AI, now only $49 for a lifetime subscription.

Writing takes time, and time is something most busy professionals don’t have much of. If you’re juggling meetings, emails, project notes, and documentation, switching to voice-powered dictation can seriously boost your productivity.

VoiceType is a powerful AI voice-to-text tool that turns your speech into clear, properly formatted text in real time. With a transcription speed of up to 360 words per minute and 99.7% accuracy, it’s designed to be significantly faster than traditional typing while still delivering professional-quality results. Right now, you can also get a VoiceType AI lifetime subscription on sale for only $49 (reg. $260).

Whether you’re drafting a report, summarizing a meeting, or planning your day, VoiceType captures your thoughts instantly and organizes them into clean, polished text. It’s not just recording every word, too. It includes features like tone matching, smart formatting, punctuation correction, and grammar suggestions.

VoiceType even adapts based on the app you’re using. Working in Notion or drafting an email in Gmail? VoiceType recognizes the context and adjusts its output accordingly. It also supports more than 35 languages and includes “Whisper Mode” for quiet environments, allowing it to pick up soft speech without missing a beat.

This lifetime subscription plan includes up to 20,000 transcribed words per month, making it a practical fit for founders, team leads, freelancers, and anyone who writes a lot every day. You can use it for journaling, documentation, planning, note-taking, and more.

VoiceType runs on your desktop via any modern browser and is compatible with both Mac and Windows. It’s already trusted by over 650,000 users, and now you can get lifetime access without paying for monthly software subscriptions.

Right now, it’s only $49 to get a VoiceType lifetime subscription, but it won’t stay that way.
summary: VoiceType AI voice-to-text tool, which turns your speech into clear, properly formatted text in real time, is now only $49 for a lifetime subscription. The tool has a transcription speed of up to 360 words per minute and 99.7% accuracy, making it significantly faster than traditional typing while delivering professional-quality results. It also includes features like tone matching, smart formatting, punctuation correction, and grammar suggestions. Currently, VoiceType can be purchased for up to 20,000 words per month, suitable for use in various aspects of writing, such as journaling, documentation, planning, and more. The company also supports over 35 languages and includes “Whisper Mode” for quiet environments.
shortSummary: VoiceType AI, a powerful voice-to-text tool with up to 360 words per minute, is available for $49 for a lifetime subscription, offering enhanced productivity and accuracy for busy professionals.

scraped_sources.text:
Turn Spoken Words into Precise Text with 99.7% Accuracy
VoiceType is an AI-enabled dictation app that helps you write at lightning speed. While most people type around 40 words per minute, VoiceType transcribes at 360 words per minute: 9x faster than average typing, significantly boosting productivity. It's 99.7% accurate, integrates with all apps, and offers smart formatting, punctuation, and grammar corrections, ensuring professional content with ease. VoiceType isn't just a transcription tool; it's like having a full-on writing assistant that helps you create content faster, more accurately, and way more efficiently than ever before.
650,000+ people have replaced their keyboard with VoiceType. Join now!
Write 9x faster with AI voice-to-text
-
99.7% Accuracy Score: Captures your words perfectly; what you say is exactly what you get
-
Tone Match: VoiceType automatically adapts based on the app you’re using
-
35+ Languages: Speak to VoiceType in any language. Multilingual support available
-
Auto-Format: Smartly formats your text as you speak, adding proper punctuation & capitalization
-
Improves Your Writing: Suggests clearer ways to say things & fix grammatical errors
-
Whisper Mode: Around other people, VoiceType understands when you speak softly.
-
Context Aware: Understands your environment & adjusts its output accordingly; no more typos and misspelled names
-
Works Across Every Application: Works with tools like Notion & Linear, making it easy to write emails and code documentation
When can people use VoiceType?
- Writing emails
- Self-reflection
- Meeting summaries
- Requirements mapping
- Journaling
- Day planning
- Project documentation
- Note-taking
See how VoiceType stacks up against other voice dictation tools
20K Plan
- Transcribe up to 20,000 words per month
- For heavy communicators
- Designed for managers, founders, and professionals who spend a lot of time communicating, organizing, and documenting.
NOTE: Available only on MacBook and Windows. No mobile app.
VoiceType is loved by hundreds of professionals
★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Joa Chim Insurance Broker
"VoiceType is incredibly good for my job. I spend all day writing emails, and in the evenings I'm very tired from typing, moving the mouse, and proofreading. VoiceType transforms my thoughts into complete emails in seconds.”
★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Alex Joes Managing Director
"I don’t typically spend money for productivity tools like this, but it has become an absolute necessity. I’ve always been a fast typer - even got teased a bit for it. But wow, using voicetype has made everything so much easier and quicker."

argos_summary: VoiceType AI offers a voice‑to‑text tool that transcribes speech at up to 360 words per minute with 99.7% accuracy, automatically formatting text and adapting to the app in use. The lifetime subscription, now discounted to $49 (regularly $260), allows up to 20,000 words per month and supports over 35 languages, Whisper Mode for quiet settings, and context‑aware output. Designed for professionals who write frequently—such as email drafting, meeting summaries, and documentation—VoiceType claims to boost productivity by replacing typing with spoken dictation. The service runs on desktop browsers for Mac and Windows and is already used by more than 650,000 users. Testimonials highlight its ease of use and time‑saving benefits for busy workers.
